com.tractrac.model.lib.api.event

Interface IEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAttachable, IIdentifiable, INamed

    public interface IEvent
extends INamed
    Encapsulates data related to an Event: Races, Competitors, Competitor Classes, Routes.
    Author:
    Jesper Grooss

    • Method Detail

      • getCompetitors

        java.util.List<ICompetitor> getCompetitors()

        Returns a collection of the competitors of this event.

        This method is thread-safety: it returns a copy of the list.

        Returns:
        a collection of the competitors of this event.

      • getControls

        java.util.List<IControl> getControls()

        Returns a collection of all controls in this event.

        This is listed explicitly, since not all controls need appear in a route.

        This method is thread-safety: it returns a copy of the list.

        Returns:
        a collection of all controls in this event.

      • getLiveURI

        java.net.URI getLiveURI()

        Returns:
